overview: A water polo feminine team trains intensely for a final competition. Eva, the team captain, wishes to win, but has noticed strange behavior from her teammates ever since trainer Omar's arrival on the team. Eva tries to discover the truth, but has no idea that she is facing a supernatural force, hungry for blood and violence.

production_companies.name: Escuela Internacional de Cine y Televisión de San Antonio de los Baños

title: Agón
